entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
